item.title: ::starter can be done more then once

item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

sendMessage(“Bashscape Starter Pack”);
starter = 1;

Change To

starter = 0;

It should work (Remember im still new to this :P)

item.title: ::starter can be done more then once
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

On my server, i put in a starter pack. I used a tutorial i found and so it works fine. So your on the server and you type ::starter and you get your money. You do it agian, you get nothing, but you get a message saying stop being greedy.
Now, heres the problem. Lets say +playername who has already gotten his starter pack, logs out. He comes back, and he types in agian, and he gets the money agian.
My problem is, that you can log out and do the starter pack agian!
How do i fix this, here are my starter codes

public int starter = 0;

The command itself

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
	if (starter == 0) {	
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(1051, 1);
	    sendMessage("Bashscape Starter Pack");
	    starter = 1;
	} else if (starter == 1) {
	    sendMessage("Why do you have to be greedy?");
	}
}

else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);
